viewData.name: Samsung NU7100 49" Class HDR UHD Multi-System Smart LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy Samsung NU7100 49" Class HDR UHD Multi-System Smart LED TV featuring Multi-System Compatible, UHD 3840 x 2160 LED Panel HDR10 & HDR10+ Support. Review Samsung NU7100
viewData.long_description: Enjoy Internet streaming content at four times the resolution of 1080p across NTSC, PAL, and SECAM TV systems with the Samsung NU7100 49" Class HDR UHD Multi-System Smart LED TV. It has a 49" LED-backlit LCD panel and incorporates Motion Rate 100 technology to digitally enhance fast-moving images to reduce blur.The NU7100 has built-in Wi-Fi connectivity to allow access to your favorite apps and Internet-based content, plus content sharing and screen mirroring with your other smart devices such as your smartphone or tablet; you can also mirror from the TV to your portable device. With three HDMI inputs, there are multiple options for connecting high-definition video sources. Two USB ports are also onboard for connecting multimedia peripherals like external hard drives.
